538	Abanye abantu basetyhini banokufakelwa izilwanyana ezimbalwa ezizodwa ezingazange zisasazeke okanye zikhule, ngelixa kwezinye izifo zinokusasazeka kuyo yonke i-pelvis.
539	Abanye abantu basetyhini banokuqala i-ovul ngokuphulukana neekhilogrem ezimbini kuphela; amanye aya esikhathini ngokufumana iikhilogrem ezimbini (ukuba phantsi komzimba kunokuthetha ukuba uyekile ngokupheleleyo ukubulala i-ovul).
540	Abanye abantu basetyhini bavumba kodwa basilele ukuvelisa izixa ezaneleyo zeeprogesterone (ukusilela kwesigaba se-luteal) emva kwe-ovulation.
541	Abanye abantu baye babonakalise iimpawu ze allergy (ukwaliwa sisiqhamo, ngokuthi ugule) ngenxa yokufana kwee protini ezifumaneka kwii mango nakwii poleni.
542	Abanye abantu baye bakwazi ukwenza i-10 000% ngosuku olunye kodwa oko kubalulekile ukulawula umngcipheko.

2024	Apho amanani akuvumelayo oku, iinqununu zingenza amalungiselelo neSebe leMicimbi yaseKhaya (Department of Home Affairs) ukuba libonelele ngoomahamba-nendlwana (mobile units) okanye ngabasebenzi kwakwenziwa isicelo soko ukuba basingathe ezi zicelo.

2036	Apho isikolo singenako ukufikelela kwi-HC-LMS, eso sikolo singacela uncedo nokuba kukwisikolo esikufuphi naso okanye sicele umphathi wekomiti yesekethe (circuit team manager) ukuba asiprintele izithuba zootitshala ezabelwe sona.

2039	Apho izikolo ezingekho phantsi kwesiqendu 21 zithi zigqithise kwisabelo sazo se-, ngenxa yaso nasiphi na isizathu, iSebe i liya kuyifumana nayiphi na inkcitho engaphezulu ngokuyixhuzula kwisabelo sesikolo se- sonyaka-mali olandelayo.
2040	Apho izikolo zineendlela ezingaphezu kwenye, makwenziwe ngenyameko ukwenzela ukuqinisekisa ukuba abafundi bafakwa kwindlela echanekileyo nakwiindawo abathathwa kuzo abafundi xa besiya esikolweni.
2041	Apho izikolo zinokunika izizathu ezibambekayo zokuba aziyi kubanayo imali eyaneleyo ekhutshwa ngokweMimiselo neMigangatho yenkxaso-mali yokuthenga i-odolo yazo eyongezelelweyo iphela, zinokwenza isicelo sokufumana uncedo kwiSebe iWCED.
2042	Apho izikolo zisebenzisa iindlela ezininzi zothutho lwabafundi, makwenziwe ngenyameko ukuqinisekisa ukuba abafundi bafakwa kwindlela nakwindawo echanekileyo abathathwa kuyo abafundi xa besiya esikolweni.
2043	Apho izilwanyana ezitya ezinye zichazwe khona njenge ‘ngxaki’ ngaphambili, indlela ezintsha zokucinga zenze okokuba kuqapheleke okokuba akusiso isilwanyana kodwa ukutya ezinye ekufuna ukulawulwa ukuze kwehliswe ilahleko.
2044	Apho izinto azijikanga basahlala ngalaa ndlela yabo yemveli, izindlu zakhona ngoongquphantsi, zisasindwa ngobulongwe.
2045	Apho ke babefundiswa ngezinto ezifunekayo nemisebenzi yasebudaleni.

2047	Apho kufuneka iinkonzo zabagadi-baviwa ababini nangaphezulu ngeseshoni apho kukho amagumbi amabini nangaphezulu asetyenziswa ngaxeshanye, umgadi-baviwa oyintloko akayi kwenza imisebenzi yesiqhelo yokugada abaviwa.

2050	Apho kufunyenwe khona izigaqa ezinetyuwa, kufuneka ilungiswe nge gypsum nokufunxwa. iGypsum iye igalelwe emhlabeni ukuze kunyuke icalcium saturation.
2051	Apho kukhiwa khona amanzi okusela nokupheka; apho kuhlanjwa khona imizimba kukhuhlwane khona imihlana nalapho kukhiwa imfuyo isela khona.

18053	Ngaphandle kokusebenzisa amehlo, amafama kufuneka asebenzise ukuva ukuqwalasela izifo nokumelana neengxaki.
18054	Ngaphandle kokusetyenziswa ekutyeni nakwintengiso zesiselo, ilamuni ne lime incindi ziyasetyenziswa emayezeni, kwimveliso ezithanjiswayo, kunye nezo zokucoca.

21476	“Sicela inkxaso kootata bonke ukuba babekho komkhulu ukuya kumamela ukuba la magosa aphuma kwiNdlu yeeNkosi azakuthi makwenziwe ntoni ngesiko lokwaluka.
21477	Sicela izikolo ukuba zimisele iithagethi ezinokufikelelwa, kwanokuba ziqulunqe izicwangciso zokuba ziya kufikelela njani kuzo.
21478	Sicela oku kombane!
21479	Sicela ujonge Imimiselo Nemiqathango Yesiqinisekiso Sokubuyiselwa Okulahlekileyo ukuze ubone imiqathango, izinto ezilinganiselweyo nezingekhoyo.

21482	Sicela ukuba zonke izikolo zizibandakanye ezi zikhokelo kwikharityhulam efundiswayo.
